steps.intro:
Welcome to the NewWorld Game!
My role, as your colleague‚Äîyour problem-solving partner‚Äîis to help us develop a solution to a global problem on which you choose to work. Let‚Äôs start.
steps.focusArea: What is the NewWorld Game Solution General Focus Area?
steps.projectTitle: Provide a starting title to your project. You can change it later as your work progresses.
steps.problemDescription: In a few words, how would you describe the specific problem you're focusing on?
steps.teamMembers: If there is a team, list its members, and add their emails below. (This enables communication between team members and, as per NWG Privacy Policy, their information will remain private.)
steps.evaluators: Add below NWG members that you want to be reviewers/evaluators of your team‚Äôs work. (The names you supply will be supplemented by others chosen at random from other NWG members.)
steps.sdgs: Select any Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) that are related to your chosen problem area.
steps.submit: Almost done! Submit to start solving your new solution.
